segments.text: Oh , you look kind of pale . What's the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you ? Just a minute . Let me get the airsick bag ready ... Here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I get you some water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I'll be all right as soon as the plane gets out of this turbulence .
segments.speaker: S2
